      • downloadAndVerifyChecksum

        public boolean downloadAndVerifyChecksum(java.net.URL checksumURL,
                                         java.nio.file.Path originalFile,
                                         java.nio.file.Path checksumFile,
                                         @Nullable
                                         HttpDownloadHelper.DownloadProgress progress,
                                         TimeValue timeout,
                                         HttpDownloadHelper.Checksummer hashFunc)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Download the given checksum URL to the destination and check the checksum
        Parameters:
        checksumURL - URL for the checksum file
        originalFile - original file to calculate checksum of
        checksumFile - destination to download the checksum file to
        hashFunc - class used to calculate the checksum of the file
        Returns:
        true if the checksum was validated, false if it did not exist
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the checksum failed to match
